name: VR crazy racing
description:
This is a casual game of racing and racing. Players put on their helmets and sit in the cockpit. Let’s have speed and excitement with the computer racer. Players need to concentrate on avoiding mistakes. If you exceed one car after another, you must pay attention to avoid collisions with them, ensure the speed and avoid mistakes and rush to the first place.

Instructions:
The trigger button on the right handle interacts with the ui menu and the throttle, the touchpad is under the throttle is the brake, and the menu button calls out the menu;
The left handle touchpad controls the left and right steering, and the menu button calls out the menu;
